recipesJson.name: Raspberry Custard
recipesJson.author: coop34
recipesJson.description: Skiddlz said it's pretty good....plus it won some prizes in a contest, and now resides in the "best of 2015" over at /r/diy_ejuice.

reviews.text: Goddamn this is a delicious raspberry custard. One of the first truly great recipes I discovered, and one I keep returning to.

I just tasted a bottle of this that I made four months ago, and, oh, my god, it's delicious. The raspberry isn't floral at all, just juicy, bright, and smothered in light, sweet, creamy goodness. Exquisite!
My all time favorite raspberry custard! Always have atleave 250 mls steeping!

This recipe is a great blend of raspberries whipped in custard. The addition of FA cream fresh makes the custard seem rather light which gives the meringue a boost in flavor and adds to the raspberries.
